description:
Rapid deployment and adjustable length make these FLZ poles a great option for dayhikers, trail runners, and backpackers. This version has improved joint structure and stiffness for navigating steep or variable terrain.

  • Carbon construction keeps the weight way down
  • Lightweight EVA grips with mini-extensions that let you choke up the shafts on steep terrain
  • Breathable, moisture-wicking straps are made from recycled materials
  • 3 sections fold Z-style for easy carrying. Locking Z-Pole deployment system and speed cones make reassembly fast and easy
  • Durable FlickLock Pro clamp allows length adjustments and clamps securely without slipping
  • Stopper baskets with shaft catchers to secure folded pole sections
  • Interchangeable rubber Tech Tips and carbide Tech Tips
name: Black Diamond Distance Carbon FLZ Poles - Unisex
